messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] unable to access message boards at Unschooling.com
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: snackieny  I was wondering if anyone has had trouble accessing the message boards at unschooling.com  I havent been on lately
messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: snackieny <LAMazz1994@...>

I was wondering if anyone has had trouble accessing the message boards
at unschooling.com I havent been on lately about 3 weeks and I tried
going on the home page and though message boards is listed in the
resource menu I am unable to click on it. Are they still there is
there another way to get to them. Any help would be greatly appreciated
-=-=-=-=-

Sorry, Lisa. The message boards at unschooling.com were shut down a
month or so ago.

Try www.unschooling.info for teh new message boards---same old folks,
new station.

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
October 6-9, 2005
http://liveandlearnconference.org

Hi,
I was wondering if anyone has had trouble accessing the message boards
at unschooling.com I havent been on lately about 3 weeks and I tried
